description:
Taiki`s team has arrived in the Dust Zone to rescue Nene, but they are soon attacked by Kiriha, who is now under DarkKnightmon`s control. Sparrowmon then arrives and tells them Nene has been imprisoned by DarkKnightmon, who is holding her brother hostage to force her into helping him gather dark power to activate the Darkness Loader. What is the Darkness Loader, and how will Taiki retaliate against Kiriha?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Decisive Battle! DarkKnightmon VS Xros Heart!
決戦! ダークナイトモン VS クロスハート!
